name: HOKKAI INVADERS
description:
HOKKAI INVADERS

Everyone is invited to a big snowball fight on the Misty Lake! Except it's 2010, and everyone suddenly includes some really scary looking fairies from Hokkai!

Fear not little fairies, Wakasagihime will protect you!

Shoot sprays of water at the invaders from Hokkai to make them go away, or freeze poor fairies with less affinity to fire. Use the frozen fairies for cover, or launch them towards your enemies to rack up points by killing several fairies in one shot. The score is multiplied by the combo count. Aim your shots well and more fairy maids will dare to go out.

Inspired by Space Invaders.

Controls:

  • 'z' to shoot
  •  'left' and 'right' to move
  •  'esc' to skip the intro and pause

Game by create2019 (https://create2019.itch.io), mojo (https://twitter.com/mozzydippers) and illusorybread (https://illusorybread.itch.io). 

Made as a submission to the Touhou Game Jam 10 (https://itch.io/jam/touhou-jam-10).

Touhou Project original concept, characters, and other elements are the property of ZUN and Team Shanghai Alice. This game is a fanmade work made according to the official guidelines. It is not affiliated with or endorsed by the original creators.
